CustomField.formula: ROUND(9*( (5*FLOOR((TODAY()-DATE(1996,01,01))/7) + MIN(5, MOD(TODAY()-DATE(1996,01,01), 7) + MIN(1, 24/9*(MOD(NOW()-DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 12:00:00'), 1))) )) - (5*FLOOR((DATEVALUE(On_Hold_Since__c)-DATE(1996,01,01))/7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(On_Hold_Since__c)-DATE(1996,01,01), 7) + MIN(1, 24/9*(MOD(On_Hold_Since__c-DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 12:00:00'), 1))) )) ), 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula field that tracks the business hours that this request has currently been on hold. When the Status is changed from On Hold to another value, the value of this field is added to the Total Business Hours On Hold and then set to 0
CustomField.label: Business Hours on Hold (Time Tracker)
